section.title: Removing Repositories
section.para: If a repository is decommissioned or requires troubleshooting, it might require removal.

step.para:
Click
(Configuration), and then
(Remove from the VMDB).

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The repositories are removed. Any virtual machines associated with the repositories remain, but are no longer associated with their respective repository. When removing a repository, the associated datastore instance is not deleted.
